content: this beautiful harlee beanie has a great stitch pattern and is the perfect compliment to the harlee button cowl this pattern is one of the september contributions to the 2024 hat of the month cal > this pattern is available for free on > my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as > a digital download above **materials ** approximately 33-114 yds of a category 4 medium weight yarn i used caron cakes yarn in the pistachio colorway size i 5 5 mm furls streamline crochet hook yarn needle for weaving ends scissors
